detail.name: Russian Nesting Dolls 3 Piece Set
detail.description: Enjoy a modern twist on an age-old tradition with our beautiful set of Russian nesting dolls. Showing vibrant artistry in a World Market-exclusive design, these time-honored matryoshka dolls are loved by enthusiasts around the globe and make a charming gift.
specifications: 3-Piece set includes large,medium andsmall nesting dollss

detail.name: Russsian dress traditional dance costume red sarafan folk clothing
detail.description: This Russian fancy dress looks stylish and perfect on every lady! The Russian folk dance is popular all over the world thanks to the elegant, smooth movements.
